name: Project: Jump!
description:
Project: Jump is an endless platformer game with different levels to play.

There are 3 different levels in the game. (yet)

The in-game currency is Coin. You can collect coins in-game. You can unlock new ball skins with coins.

Also, there are daily challenges to earn coins.

And another pickup is Star, you collect them to unlock new levels. It can be collected in-game like coins, but less frequently.

It's containing ads, but only rewarded ads.

No music yet but you can hear sounds from pickups.
